display_name: Calculated - RDI in non-supine body position (>= 4% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or REM sleep time is 4
calculation: 60*(hrop4 + hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4 + marop4 + manrop4)/(remepop+nremepop)
